Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Golden Dolphin Way, running east to west next to the city wall.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of Golden Dolphin Way, Leonardo's Foundry greets the incoming visitors to Oceancrest. The foundry caters to specialized metals and alloys, however, this service is not without a cost. Most of the prized metals, such as adamantine and mithril, are very rare and also very expensive. The entrance to the foundry is located off of Main Street, to the east.
